item.rel_title: Development and utilization of an intelligent application for aiding COVID-19 diagnosis
item.rel_abs: On basis of laboratory examinations indicators from a total of 620 samples, a machine learning-based diagnosis model was developed, and subsequently implemented as a COVID-19 diagnosis aid APP. External validation showed satisfiable model prediction performance (i.e., AUC= 0.872) which guarantees the promising use of this tool for extensive screening.
item.rel_authors: Meng, Z.; Wang, M.; Song, H.; Guo, S.; Zhou, Y.; Li, W.; Zhou, Y.; Li, M.; Song, X.; Zhou, Y.; Li, Q.; Lu, X.; Ying, B.
